snippet: The Australian Olympic Committee has advised athletes not to travel into downtown areas of Sochi, Russia, outside the secured perimeter of Olympic Games sites.
abstract: Australian Olympic Committee imposes travel restrictions on team members in Sochi, Russia, advising athletes not to travel into downtown areas outside the secured perimeter of Olympic Games sites.
lead_paragraph: The Australian Olympic Committee has advised athletes not to travel into downtown areas of Sochi, Russia, outside the secured perimeter of Olympic Games sites.
